Eragon.Action: Smiles at the injured doe and hesitates to shoot, showing compassion for the animal.
Misses the shot after hesitating, indicating reluctance to harm.
Carefully approaches the forest edge, prepares bow and arrow, attempts to hunt deer by aiming carefully.
Arrow misses the deer after a sudden unexpected flash of light startles the herd.
Shows awareness and curiosity by investigating the source of the mysterious light after the failed shot.
Hesitates in fear before taking the Sapphire Stone, handles it carefully, and places it thoughtfully in his pack.
Walks into the butcher shop and tries to explain his situation despite having no money.
Does not respond with anger or sarcasm to Sloan's hostility and refusal to give him meat.
Offers the Sapphire Stone as payment honestly, insists he did not steal it despite Sloan's accusations.
Stands silently and confused when Sloan orders him to leave aggressively.
Offers the Sapphire Stone as payment despite skepticism and hostility from Sloan.
Stands his ground silently when Sloan threatens him to leave.
Explains clearly and honestly where he found the stone when questioned by Horst.
Does not escalate the conflict aggressively despite Sloan's hostility.
Appears confused and does not respond immediately to Sloan's threats.
Thanks Horst politely for helping him get meat despite Sloan's reluctance.
Offers to return the rock to Horst but accepts Horst's insistence to keep it.

Waves farewell to Horst after their interaction, indicating friendliness and politeness.
Successfully negotiates with Horst to obtain enough meat to fill his pack without immediate payment, showing practical problem-solving and social skills.
Forgets to deliver the message initially and then awkwardly adds a personal compliment, showing slight social awkwardness but still completes the task.
Brings meat home to share with Garrow despite Garrow's refusal to accept charity.
Explains honestly how he obtained the meat and his plans to work it off.
Expresses gladness to be home to his uncle.
Keeps the Sapphire Stone hidden under his bed rather than showing it off or boasting.
Explains clearly to Garrow how he plans to work off the cost of the meat, showing responsibility and forethought.
Admits uncertainty about how he will manage his commitments, showing some self-awareness but also doubt.

Keeps the Sapphire Stone hidden under his bed rather than openly discussing it, indicating cautiousness and prudence.
Shares the discovery of the strange rock with Roran, inviting him to see it.
Carefully places the Sapphire Stone into his pack, showing respect and care for the object.

Invites Roran to see the strange rock, showing openness and confidence.
Sits down to eat without showing urgency despite the need to leave soon.

Remains calm and observant when the Stone makes noises and moves, showing awareness and attentiveness.

Despite injury and pain after landing, quickly assesses his condition and remains focused on the threat.

Expresses frustration and emotional pain over the situation, showing vulnerability and doubt.
